rows.label: bf04020100_0010
rows.name:
The soul does not die, nor does it wander -
-it is merely passed on.

rows.label: bf04020100_0020
rows.name:
Blessed be the bonds of life, 
all within the law of the eternal cycle.

rows.label: bf04020100_0030
rows.name:
Why make grave here? Can we
not take Biggipon home to village?

rows.label: bf04020100_0040
rows.name:
Burying him where he fell is how 
we honor a mercenary's soul.

rows.label: bf04020100_0060
rows.name: All because I listened to those guys...

rows.label: bf04020100_0080
rows.name:
It's not your fault. 
I think they would have appeared before us eventually anyway

rows.label: bf04020100_0090
rows.name:
What matters is that Vandham-san
saved all our lives.

rows.label: bf04020100_0100
rows.name:
For now, 
let's just say "thank you" and send him off.

rows.label: bf04020100_0122
rows.name: I'll fight my own war. With Homura.

rows.label: bf04020100_0160
rows.name: I see. I was worried you might never wake up.

rows.label: bf04020100_0170
rows.name: By the way, Homura, about yesterday...

rows.label: bf04020100_0180
rows.name: Why did you suddenly change like that?

rows.label: bf04020100_0200
rows.name:
I want to know too. 
That power wasn't normal.

rows.label: bf04020100_0210
rows.name: Is that the Holy Grail's true power?

rows.label: bf04020100_0220
rows.name: Please explain properly what happened to you.

rows.label: bf04020100_0230
rows.name:
Tora want to know too. 
Homura-chan was super strong!

rows.label: bf04020100_0310
rows.name: Why did you wake me up?!

rows.label: bf04020100_0330
rows.name:
Even though I didn't want to wake up... 
Even though I didn't want to come out...

rows.label: bf04020100_0340
rows.name:
Because I didn't want to use this power, 
I had that girl take my place...

rows.label: bf04020100_0370
rows.name:
If you have been more careful,
I wouldn't have had to wake up!

rows.label: bf04020100_0380
rows.name: I wouldn't have had to use this power!

rows.label: bf04020100_0390
rows.name:
Didn't you listen to that Vandham guy? 
He told you to run.

rows.label: bf04020100_0400
rows.name:
But you just had to push yourself. Idiot.
Look where it's got us now!

rows.label: bf04020100_0440
rows.name: I knew that continuing like that wouldn't work.

rows.label: bf04020100_0462
rows.name: I didn't want to hand you over to them.

rows.label: bf04020100_0490
rows.name: A-anyway, if you have questions, ask that girl.

rows.label: bf04020100_0520
rows.name: I'm sorry, I've caused trouble for everyone.
